summary: A portrait of Keith Richards that takes us on a journey to discover the genesis of his sound as a songwriter, guitarist and performer.
cast: Keith Richards|Anthony DeCurtis|Steve Jordan|Tom Waits|Pierre de Beauport|Buddy Guy|Waddy Wachtel|Ivan Neville|Clifton Anderson|Kevin Batchelor|Larry Campbell|Charles Dougherty|Bernard Fowler|Paul Nowinski|Chuck Berry|Ingrid Berry|Chris Ethridge|The Flying Burrito Brothers|Tom Hanks|Patti Hansen|Chris Hillman|Nicky Hopkins|Jeffrey Hunter|Mick Jagger|Johnnie Johnson|Brian Jones|Bobby Keys|Bernie Leadon|Chuck Leavell|Little Richard|Dean Martin|Marilyn Monroe|Karen Morley|Paul Muni|Gram Parsons|Elvis Presley|The Rolling Stones|Joey Spampinato|Gene Vincent|Muddy Waters|Charlie Watts|John Wayne|Howlin' Wolf|Ronnie Wood|Bill Wyman
title: Keith Richards: Under the Influence
